name: Deep location - Fnaf Game
description:
You work at the writer company which is a mail center for animatronics production companies, your name is raphael badier you are responsible for taking care of the maintenance of the place and also at night you are not alone. animatronics are with you and their only purpose is to kill you because their system has been infected with a virus.

  • 2 languages : french and english
  • 7 night
  • different gameplay at end of the night
  • nightmare mode
  • aggresive mode
  • minigame hidden
  • extra
  • characters inedit

CINEMA 4D : modeling, rendering , animating

Click team fusion 2.5 : game engine

Audacity : music and sound edit
